title: SME for BCIP 5.5 - External Messaging

Work has ranged from technical guidance to Prime contractor and sub-contractors, arranging complex trials to system acceptance and test.

title: SME to MORPHEUS - Open Systems, System Management
description: As a precursor to MORPHEUS I'm running a small programme defining the software and data structure of a Tactical Communication Management System, based on the principles of supporting equipment evolution, minimising dependence on monolithic software by driving UI, code of connections, business service rules through data rather than s/w code. The aim to minimising release cycle times, increasing flexibility, driving competition in to equipment procurement, whilst supporting royalty free or MoD fit for purpose interfaces. The further goal is to deliver Information Management coherency between applications, across platforms and finally across the battlefield using a bespoke Common Information Model based around ESB technology.
